==Translingual==
{{stroke order|strokes=3}}

===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}

Older form have a man [[人]] behind something [[𠃊]], hiding.

[[人]] have been [[replaced]] by [[亠]] in modern form.

Is also interpreted as a {{liushu|p}} : a picture of a broken [[sickle]], meaning destroyed/dead.
